Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct(from a scorpion venom peptide library)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.23415044] Virus:Hepatitis C virus ( EC50 = 0.85 μg/ml ).Cytotoxic:Huh7.5.1 cells (CC50>500 μg/ml)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.23415044] HC50 = 416.4 μg/ml against human red blood cells.
Sequence Information.Function: Inhibits hepatitis C virus(HCV) infection via inactivating infectious viral particle.  However, it cannot suppress established infection because of the poor cellular uptake and restriction of endosomes.

Literature.Title: Design of histidine-rich peptides with enhanced bioavailability and inhibitory activity against hepatitis C virus.
Literature.Author: Hong W, Zhang R, Di Z, He Y, Zhao Z, Hu J, Wu Y, Li W, Cao Z.
